meanings.definition: Located on the outside of a boat.
meanings.sent1: The outboards seats on the boat were perfect for enjoying the view.
meanings.sent2: The outboards lights on the boat illuminated the water at night.
meanings.sent3: The outboards chairs on the boat made it feel like a floating living room.
meanings.sent4: The outboards decorations on the boat added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The outboards design of the boat made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.definition: A type of motor that is attached to the outside of a boat.
meanings.sent1: The fishermen relied on the outboards to power their boat through the waves.
meanings.sent2: The outboards hummed softly as the boat glided across the lake.
meanings.sent3: The outboards on the boat seemed to whisper secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent4: The outboards roared to life, propelling the boat forward with speed.
meanings.sent5: The outboards purred contentedly as the boat cruised along the river.

meanings.definition: To surpass or exceed in performance.
meanings.sent1: The new engine outboards the old one in terms of speed.
meanings.sent2: She always strives to outboards her previous achievements.
meanings.sent3: His determination to outboards his rivals was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent4: The team managed to outboards all expectations with their performance.
meanings.sent5: Their innovative approach outboards traditional methods in efficiency.
